Complete implementation of a real-time multiplayer card game with the following features:

## Game Features
- Reduce Cards game with 54-card deck \(52 standard + 2 jokers\)
- 2-4 players per room
- Real-time turn-based gameplay
- Strategic card dropping and drawing mechanics
- Special rules: same rank matching, multiple card drops
- Show cards to end game \(lowest value wins\)

- SQLite database for user authentication
- Lobby and room management system
- Turn-based game engine
- Automatic room cleanup when empty
- Enhanced error handling and logging

### Frontend \(Vanilla JS + CSS\)
- Responsive UI with professional card designs
- CSS-based card styling \(no external images\)
- Real-time game state updates
- Custom styled modals for confirmations
- Live scoreboard tracking across rounds
